data.name: Hybrid M&A Integration
data.description: Merger and acquisition integration program combining structured milestones with agile workstreams.

phases.name: Day 1 Readiness
phases.description: Legal close requirements, communications, IT access

phases.name: First 100 Days
phases.description: Critical integration milestones and quick wins

phases.name: Full Integration
phases.description: Systems consolidation, process harmonization, org design

phases.name: Synergy Realization
phases.description: Track and validate deal synergy targets

taskTemplates.name: IT access provisioning
taskTemplates.description: Ensure acquired team has system access

taskTemplates.name: Process harmonization
taskTemplates.description: Align key business processes across entities

taskTemplates.name: Synergy tracking setup
taskTemplates.description: Define synergy metrics and tracking cadence

riskPresets.title: Customer churn
riskPresets.description: Customers leave due to integration disruption

riskPresets.title: Synergy shortfall
riskPresets.description: Integration fails to deliver expected synergies

data.name: Hybrid Enterprise Rollout
data.description: Large-scale enterprise rollout with agile workstreams and waterfall milestones.

phases.name: Program Setup
phases.description: Governance structure, stakeholder alignment, and planning

phases.name: Pilot Wave
phases.description: Initial rollout to pilot sites with agile execution

phases.name: Scale Wave
phases.description: Expand to remaining sites based on pilot learnings

phases.name: Stabilization
phases.description: Resolve issues, optimize, and standardize

phases.name: Handover
phases.description: Transfer to BAU operations and close program

taskTemplates.name: Governance charter
taskTemplates.description: Define program governance, RACI, and escalation paths

taskTemplates.name: Stakeholder mapping
taskTemplates.description: Identify and engage key stakeholders across sites

taskTemplates.name: Pilot retrospective
taskTemplates.description: Capture lessons learned and adjust plan

taskTemplates.name: BAU handover
taskTemplates.description: Document and transfer to operations team

riskPresets.title: Resource contention
riskPresets.description: Shared resources spread too thin across waves

data.name: Hybrid Program Delivery
data.description: Mixed delivery combining agile execution with plan-driven governance. Tracks both flow metrics and financial KPIs.

phases.name: Discovery
phases.description: Requirements and architecture spikes

phases.name: Iterative Delivery
phases.description: Sprint-based execution with governance gates

phases.name: Stabilization
phases.description: Integration testing and release readiness

phases.name: Transition
phases.description: Deployment, training, and handover

data.name: Waterfall Regulatory Program
data.description: Plan-driven regulatory compliance program with formal documentation, baselines, and audit-ready evidence.

phases.name: Gap Analysis
phases.description: Assess current compliance posture against requirements

phases.name: Remediation Planning
phases.description: Design controls, policies, and remediation actions

phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: Deploy controls, train staff, update processes

phases.name: Testing & Evidence
phases.description: Control effectiveness testing and evidence collection

phases.name: Certification / Audit
phases.description: External audit support and certification submission

taskTemplates.name: Gap assessment
taskTemplates.description: Identify control gaps and prioritize remediation

taskTemplates.name: Evidence collection
taskTemplates.description: Gather and organize audit evidence packages

taskTemplates.name: Audit preparation
taskTemplates.description: Prepare documentation and brief audit team

riskPresets.title: Control gap discovered late
riskPresets.description: Critical control gap found during audit

riskPresets.title: Insufficient evidence
riskPresets.description: Audit evidence does not meet requirements

data.name: Waterfall Vendor Implementation
data.description: Plan-driven vendor software implementation with formal scope, baselines, and change control.

phases.name: Discovery & Scoping
phases.description: Requirements gathering, vendor alignment, SOW sign-off

phases.name: Design
phases.description: Solution design, configuration specifications, data mapping

phases.name: Build & Configure
phases.description: Vendor configuration, customization, data migration

phases.name: Test & Validate
phases.description: UAT, integration testing, performance testing

phases.name: Go-Live & Support
phases.description: Deployment, training, and early-life support

taskTemplates.name: SOW review
taskTemplates.description: Review and approve statement of work

taskTemplates.name: Data migration plan
taskTemplates.description: Map source to target data and define ETL approach

riskPresets.title: Integration failure
riskPresets.description: System integration points fail during testing

data.name: Waterfall Infrastructure Migration
data.description: Plan-driven infrastructure migration with earned value tracking, formal baselines, and change control.

phases.name: Assessment
phases.description: Inventory, dependency mapping, and readiness assessment

phases.name: Planning
phases.description: Migration plan, schedule baseline, cost baseline

phases.name: Build & Test
phases.description: Target environment build and validation

phases.name: Migration Execution
phases.description: Cutover execution with rollback plan

phases.name: Hypercare
phases.description: Post-migration support and stabilization

taskTemplates.name: Inventory assessment
taskTemplates.description: Document all systems, dependencies, and data flows

taskTemplates.name: Risk assessment
taskTemplates.description: Identify migration risks and mitigation strategies

taskTemplates.name: Migration plan
taskTemplates.description: Sequence of migration waves with rollback criteria

taskTemplates.name: Cost baseline
taskTemplates.description: Set approved budget baseline for migration

taskTemplates.name: Cutover execution
taskTemplates.description: Execute migration cutover per approved plan

taskTemplates.name: Post-migration validation
taskTemplates.description: Verify all services operational in target

riskPresets.title: Rollback failure
riskPresets.description: Unable to revert to source in case of issues

data.name: Kanban Risk and Compliance Tracking
data.description: Flow-based risk register and compliance action tracking. Best for GRC teams managing ongoing audit findings and risk mitigations.

phases.name: Continuous Tracking
phases.description: Ongoing risk and compliance action management

taskTemplates.name: Risk register setup
taskTemplates.description: Initialize risk categories and severity matrix

taskTemplates.name: Compliance checklist
taskTemplates.description: Define compliance requirements and evidence needs

taskTemplates.name: Audit finding triage
taskTemplates.description: Classify and route incoming audit findings

riskPresets.title: Data breach exposure
riskPresets.description: Sensitive data exposed due to control gap

riskPresets.title: Audit finding escalation
riskPresets.description: Open finding not resolved within SLA

data.name: Kanban Continuous Improvement
data.description: Flow-based continuous improvement tracking. Ideal for teams running ongoing optimization initiatives without fixed sprints.

phases.name: Continuous Flow
phases.description: Ongoing improvement execution with pull-based work

taskTemplates.name: Define flow policies
taskTemplates.description: Document pull policies and done criteria

taskTemplates.name: Weekly flow review
taskTemplates.description: Recurring review of cycle time and bottlenecks

data.name: Kanban Service Desk Intake
data.description: Flow-based service desk and ticket intake management. Best for teams handling continuous inbound requests with SLA targets.

phases.name: Continuous Intake
phases.description: Ongoing ticket triage and processing

taskTemplates.name: Set WIP limits
taskTemplates.description: Define work-in-progress limits per service tier

taskTemplates.name: Define SLA targets
taskTemplates.description: Set response and resolution time targets

taskTemplates.name: Triage process
taskTemplates.description: Document intake classification and routing rules

data.name: Scrum Operations Improvement
data.description: Sprint-based continuous improvement for operations teams. Ideal for kaizen events, process optimization, and operational efficiency programs.

phases.name: Assess Current State
phases.description: Map current processes and identify bottlenecks

phases.name: Improvement Sprint 1
phases.description: Implement highest-impact improvements

phases.name: Improvement Sprint 2
phases.description: Refine and extend improvements

phases.name: Sustain & Measure
phases.description: Validate improvements and standardize

data.name: Scrum Product Launch
data.description: Sprint-based product launch execution. Ideal for cross-functional teams preparing market releases, beta programs, or go-to-market sprints.

phases.name: Launch Planning
phases.description: Define launch scope, channels, and milestones

phases.name: Sprint 1 – Build
phases.description: Core deliverables: landing pages, messaging, collateral

phases.name: Sprint 2 – Polish
phases.description: QA, final reviews, stakeholder sign-off

phases.name: Launch Execution
phases.description: Go-live, monitor, and iterate

taskTemplates.name: Define launch goals
taskTemplates.description: Align on success metrics and target audience

taskTemplates.name: Build core assets
taskTemplates.description: Create landing pages, emails, and collateral

data.name: Scrum Software Delivery
data.description: Sprint-based software delivery with velocity tracking, WIP limits, and iterative planning. Best for development teams working in 1-4 week sprints.

phases.name: Sprint Planning
phases.description: Backlog refinement and sprint goal setting

phases.name: Sprint Execution
phases.description: Development, daily standups, and progress tracking

phases.name: Sprint Review & Retro
phases.description: Demo, review, and retrospective

taskTemplates.name: Sprint goal
taskTemplates.description: Define and agree on sprint goal
